FuncDef:
The adv-factor command specifies the advantage factor for a UDP voice jitter test instance.
The undo adv-factor command deletes the advantage factor configured for a UDP voice jitter test instance. The adv-factor command specifies the advantage factor for a UDP voice jitter test instance. The undo adv-factor command deletes the advantage factor configured for a UDP voice jitter test instance. By default, the advantage factor configured for a UDP voice jitter test instance is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the advantage factor for a UDP voice jitter test instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 20.
